name: Course Enrollment Report
query:
select
pe.admission_status as "Admission Status", pe.name as "Course Enrollment (System ID)", pe.student as "Student (System ID)", s.student_applicant as "Student Applicant (System ID)", s.student_application_id as "WSC Application ID", 
pe.student_name as "Student Name",pe.programs as "Course Name", pe.student_category as "Caste Category", s.gender as "Gender", s.district as "District", s.block as "Block",s.student_mobile_number as "Student Mobile Number",s.student_email_id as "Student Email Address",
pe.department as "Department" ,pe.program_grade as  "Course Type" ,pe.academic_year as "Academic Year",pe.program as "Semester", pe.academic_term as "Academic Term", pe.student_category as "Student Category",
s.fathers_name  as "Father's Name",s.fathers_contact_number  as "Father's Contact Number",s.mothers_name as "Mother's Name",s.mothers_contact_number as "Mother's Contact Number", s.local_guardians_name as "Local Guardian's Name",
s.local_guardian_contact_no as "Local Guardian's Contact No.",s.blood_group as "Blood Group",s.roll_no as "Roll No", (CASE when s.image IS NULL THEN 'NO' ELSE 'YES' END) as "Profile Photo"
from `tabProgram Enrollment` as pe
LEFT JOIN `tabStudent` as s 
on s.name=pe.student where pe.docstatus=1;
